solution_line_template: The total number of straws that the piglets shared is {total_straws}-{straws_fed_to_adult_pigs} = <<{total_straws}-{straws_fed_to_adult_pigs}={straws_for_piglets}>>{straws_for_piglets}
Since there were {num_piglets} piglets, each piglet ate {straws_for_piglets}/{num_piglets} = <<{straws_for_piglets}/{num_piglets}={straws_per_piglet}>>{straws_per_piglet} straws
